effect_entries.effect: Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
An attack that can be used only if the
user is asleep. The harsh noise may also
make the target flinch.
